Date: Monday, 6/2/1993
Subject: Progress of Frank Castillo
Dear Sir,
Frank Castillo has nothing more to prove at AA Shreveport Captains!
He has an ERA of 3.10 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
